select count(*) from noback_notice
where upper(notice_title) like '%' || upper(#{search}) || '%'

select b.notice_num , b.notice_title , b.notice_content , to_char(b.notice_date, 'YY/MM/DD') as notice_date , m.employee_name as notice_writer_name , b.notice_originfile , b.notice_savedfile from noback_notice b, noback_member m where b.notice_writer = m.employee_num
and upper(b.notice_title) like '%' || upper(#{search}) || '%'
order by b.notice_num desc

select b.notice_num , b.notice_title , b.notice_content , to_char(b.notice_date, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as notice_date , b.notice_writer , m.employee_name as notice_writer_name , b.notice_originfile , b.notice_savedfile from noback_notice b, noback_member m where b.notice_writer = m.employee_num and notice_num = #{notice_num}
